about.title: About
about.description: AI Onda is a blog delivering verified AI technology and trends
about.whatWeDo: AI Onda curates trending AI content from Korean tech communities, verifies facts using AI, and translates them to English for global audiences. The name means 'AI is coming' in Korean.
about.mission: Our mission is to provide accurate, verified information amid the rapid advancement of AI technology. We deliver information based on reliable sources, not rumors or speculation.
about.verification: All posts go through the following verification process:
about.verificationStep2: 2. Fact-checking against official sources (company blogs, technical docs)
